def_en: An estranged wife or husband is no longer living with their husband or wife.

def_cn: （因与亲朋发生争吵而）疏远的，不和的，不来往的
def_en: If you are estranged from your family or friends, you have quarrelled with them and are not communicating with them.

def_cn: （与社团、职业等）疏离的，疏远的，脱离的
def_en: If you describe someone as estranged from something such as society or their profession, you mean that they no longer seem involved in it.
